short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get remote jobs without the need to browser many sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remotic helps you get remote jobs from all major platforms. Choose the platform to search from and remotic will pull all related jobs for you. With remotic, you do not have to visit several website to look for jobs.
